titleStmt.title: The Notes of the church as laid down by Cardinal Bellarmin examined and confuted : with a table of contents.
titleStmt.author: Sherlock, William, 1641?-1707.

notesStmt.note: "A brief discourse concerning the notes of the church, with some reflections on Cardinal Bellarmin's notes" (p. 1-24 of 2nd grouping) has special t.p. and continuous paging.
Each "note" or chapter begins with a caption title, and ends with an errata and Richard Chiswell's imprint.
The chapters are by William Sherlock and 15 other divines of the Church of England.
Advertisements: p. [33]-[36] of 1st grouping, and p. [1] at end.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
